```{r, tidy_2012}
cces_2012 <- cces_2012 %>%
  select(1:4, 6:15, faminc, CC316, CC317) %>%
  filter(inputstate == "North Carolina")

```

```{r, tidy_2014}
cces_2014 <- cces_2014 %>%
  select(1:6, birthyr, gender, educ, race, hispanic, votereg, votereg_f, inputstate, faminc, CC14_316, CC14_317) %>%
  filter(inputstate == "North Carolina")
```
